Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with two bands in added white; exterior: painted decoration consisting of sphinx (tip of wing, rump and part of tail remaining) to left; large dot rosette as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0423) (phase 2)
